file.name: apex_central.yaml
file.content:
components:
  schemas:
    tmp0:
      properties:
        success: {type: string}
      type: object
    tmp1:
      properties:
        result_code: {type: string}
        result_content: {type: string}
        result_description: {type: string}
      type: object
    tmp2:
      properties:
        json: {type: string}
      type: object
    tmp3:
      properties:
        ErrorCode: {type: string}
        ErrorMsg: {type: string}
        ExtractingStatus: {type: string}
        FileAddedDatetime: {type: string}
        FileHashID: {type: string}
        FileName: {type: string}
        Result: {type: string}
        ShortDesc: {type: string}
        Title: {type: string}
        UploadedBy: {type: string}
        UploadedFrom: {type: string}
        message: {type: string}
      type: object
    tmp4:
      properties:
        json: {type: string}
      type: object
  securitySchemes: {}
info:
  contact: {email: frikky@shuffler.io, name: '@frikkylikeme', url: 'https://twitter.com/frikkylikeme'}
  description: Automated generation of Trend Micro Apex Central
  title: Trend Micro Apex Central
  version: 1.0.0
  x-logo: data:image/png;base64,
openapi: 3.0.2
paths:
  tmp0:
    post:
      description: Apex Central API Add content to a UDSO List
      parameters:
      - description: 'The suspicious object content for the specified type

          ip:provide the IPv4 address

          url:provide the URL starting with http:// or https:// (maximum length: 2047
          characters)

          file_sha1:provide the file SHA-1 hash (maximum length: 40 characters)

          domain:provide the domain'
        example: ''
        in: query
        name: Content
        required: true
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: 'The scan action to perform on the suspicious object (maximum
          length: 64 characters) log block


          '
        example: ''
        in: query
        name: Scan Action
        required: true
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: 'The suspicious object type ip url file_sha1 domain


          '
        example: ''
        in: query
        name: Type
        required: true
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: Expiration UTC Date
        example: ''
        in: query
        name: Expiration UTC Date
        required: false
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: Notes
        example: ''
        in: query
        name: Notes
        required: false
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: Some Trend Micro Apex endpoints may begin with `/WebApp`
        example: ''
        in: query
        name: Use WebApp Endpoint
        required: false
        schema: {type: string}
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema: {$ref: '#/components/schemas/tmp0'}
          description: Successful request
      summary: Trend Micro Apex Central Add to UDSO List
  tmp1:
    post:
      description: Apex Central API File USDO add.
      parameters:
      - description: USDO files to add to Trend Micro Apex
        example: ''
        in: query
        name: USDO File
        required: true
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: "The scan action to perform: \u25CF Log \u25CF Block \u25CF Quarantine"
        example: ''
        in: query
        name: File Scan Action
        required: false
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: Additional Info
        example: ''
        in: query
        name: Note
        required: false
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: Some Trend Micro Apex endpoints may begin with `/WebApp`
        example: ''
        in: query
        name: Use WebApp Endpoint
        required: false
        schema: {type: string}
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema: {$ref: '#/components/schemas/tmp1'}
          description: Successful request
      summary: Trend Micro Apex Central File USDO Add
  tmp2:
    post:
      description: Apex Central API Get Host
      parameters:
      - description: Host name to look up
        example: ''
        in: query
        name: Host Name
        required: true
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: Some Trend Micro Apex endpoints may begin with `/WebApp`
        example: ''
        in: query
        name: Use WebApp Endpoint
        required: false
        schema: {type: string}
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema: {$ref: '#/components/schemas/tmp2'}
          description: Successful request
      summary: Trend Micro Apex Central Get Host
  tmp3:
    post:
      description: Apex Central API List available YARA rules
      parameters:
      - description: Fuzzy Match String
        example: ''
        in: query
        name: Fuzzy Match String
        required: true
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: Some Trend Micro Apex endpoints may begin with `/WebApp`
        example: ''
        in: query
        name: Use WebApp Endpoint
        required: false
        schema: {type: string}
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema: {$ref: '#/components/schemas/tmp3'}
          description: Successful request
      summary: Trend Micro Apex Central List YARA Rules
  tmp4:
    post:
      description: Apex Central API list all UDSO entries.
      parameters:
      - description: Query String
        example: ''
        in: query
        name: Query String
        required: false
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: Some Trend Micro Apex endpoints may begin with `/WebApp` overrides
          asset config
        example: ''
        in: query
        name: Use WebApp Endpoint
        required: false
        schema: {type: string}
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema: {$ref: '#/components/schemas/tmp4'}
          description: Successful request
      summary: Trend Micro Apex Central List UDSO entries
tags:
- {name: Endpoint Security & Management}

Error: parse: parse spec: parse operations: path "tmp1": path MUST begin with a forward slash
